alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Malibu Coast; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 30 at 10:04PM PST until January 01 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected becoming northwest around midnight. * WHERE...Most coasts and valleys of Ventura and Los Angeles Counties and the Santa Barbara South Coast. * WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
